distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for glib2 fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2018-16428: Do not do a NULL pointer dereference (crash).
  Avoid that, at the cost of introducing a new translatable error
  message (bsc#1107121).
- CVE-2018-16429: Fixed out-of-bounds read vulnerability ing_markup_parse_context_parse() (bsc#1107116).

Non-security issue fixed:

- various GVariant parsing issues have been resolved (bsc#1111499)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In GNOME GLib 2.56.1, g_markup_parse_context_end_parse() in gmarkup.c has a NULL pointer dereference.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: GNOME GLib 2.56.1 has an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in g_markup_parse_context_parse() in gmarkup.c, related to utf8_str().
